entry.title: Combined summary - Contribution
entry.summary: An employee of lbry.io is interested in contributing to Bitcoin's core and has inquired about implementing base_blob and/or base_uint derived from std::array, which would enable move semantics. They also express concerns about acquiring/releasing recursive mutex in a loop, as seen in minig.cpp, which creates a new block and then processes it. The mailing list mentioned is specifically for Bitcoin protocol development and can be subscribed to on the Linux Foundation website. Those interested in discussing code changes to Bitcoin Core can use the separate mailing list or submit changes directly to the Bitcoin repository on GitHub.
